title: 5 Steps to a Debt-Free Life (Ft. Alejandra Rojas)
description:
Did you know there's more to money management than budgeting and saving? 

In fact, taking a holistic approach to finance, one that takes into account your habits, personality, and dreams, can be way more effective than just putting together a spreadsheet of what you spend each month.

So in this episode, Jordan talks with holistic financial coach Alejandra Rojas about how to manage money, get out of debt, and unlock the potential to build your dreams. 

Get ready to learn everything you need to manage your money well (without all the stress)!

Tune in to learn:

  • The importance of taking a holistic approach to finance 
  • 5 steps to go from stressful debt to a joyful debt-free journey
  • The role dreaming plays in money management
  • How fear can keep us from achieving our monetary goals
  • Where to start when it comes to creating a stress-free budget
  • How to break the cycle of debt

Want to learn more? Explore Alejandra's website at https://alejandrar.com/.
author: matt@jordanleedooley.com (Jordan Lee Dooley)
